node_id.description: A comma-separated list of node IDs or names to limit the returned information; use `_local` to return information from the node you're connecting to, leave empty to get information from all nodes

interval.description: The interval for the second sampling of threads

snapshots.description: Number of samples of thread stacktrace (default: 10)

threads.description: Specify the number of threads to provide information for (default: 3)
